description: Forum of Incident Response and Security Teams (FIRST) Information Exchange Policy (IEP) framework v2.0 policy reference

predicates.description: Refers to a unique IEP Policy ID to identify a specific IEP policy at a remote location.
This is the remote URL specifying the IEP Policy File that contains the IEP Policy you wish to use.
States the version of the IEP framework that has been used. Must be set to 2.0.

entry.expanded: The IEP version value must be 2.0
